name: @myskyline_ai/ccdebug
description: 跟踪记录CC请求，可针对特定请求反复调试验证，以更直观的时间线形式展示CC日志

scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy:files && cd web/server && npx tsc && cd ../.. && npm run build:web
scripts.copy:files: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const srcDir='src'; const distDir='dist'; if(!fs.existsSync(distDir))fs.mkdirSync(distDir); ['interceptor-loader.js','token-extractor.js'].forEach(file=>{const src=path.join(srcDir,file); const dest=path.join(distDir,file); if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(src,dest); console.log('Copied '+src+' to '+dest);}});"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:copy" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:copy: nodemon --watch src/interceptor-loader.js --watch src/token-extractor.js --exec "node -e \"const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const distDir='dist'; if(!fs.existsSync(distDir))fs.mkdirSync(distDir); ['interceptor-loader.js','token-extractor.js'].forEach(file=>{const src=path.join('src',file); const dest=path.join(distDir,file); if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(src,dest); console.log('Copied '+src+' to '+dest);}});\""
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const distDir='dist'; if(fs.existsSync(distDir)){fs.rmSync(distDir,{recursive:true,force:true}); console.log('Cleaned dist directory');} else {console.log('Dist directory does not exist');}"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
